description: Manage dates and times effortlessly. Retrieve the current date and time, find the day of the week for any date, and format dates in your preferred style. Get clear timezone details for your current or a specified region.

capabilities.name: get-current-datetime
capabilities.description: Returns the current date and time. Optionally specify a timezone.

capabilities.name: get-day-of-week
capabilities.description: Returns the day of the week for a given date or today.

capabilities.name: get-timezone-info
capabilities.description: Returns information about the current or specified timezone.

capabilities.name: format-date
capabilities.description: Format a date in various styles (short, medium, long, full).
